overview: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

Youâ€™ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through the chat model picker (agent, ask, and edit modes). If you do not yet have access, please check again later.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Copilot Business and Copilot Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the new GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex policies in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the models in the model picker across all supported IDEs.
For individual plans, enable either model by selecting it in the model picker in any supported IDE and confirming the one-time prompt.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot today.
Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
